DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether ( ) brief alcohol intervention , ( b ) brief bystander social norm intervention , ( c ) brief alcohol brief bystander social norm intervention effective reduce alcohol use sexual-related behavior among college men mandate receive alcohol intervention university .
